[Page Title: The Refuge - Coffee Bar]

Coffee Bar
Coffee & Tea

[Page Title: The Refuge - Specials]

Specials

Sunday January 18th

Fresh Lobster Night • Lobster night is a staff and customer favorite at The Refuge. Fresh-off-the-boat lobsters are flown down each Saturday from Vinalhaven, a small island located off the coast of Maine that is home to the second largest lobstering harbor in the world. All lobsters are one and half pounds and are perfectly steamed to order. They are served the Maine way with lemon, hot drawn butter and a variety of sides to choose from. Reservations are strongly suggested and quantities are limited. Come and enjoy the only whole steamed Maine lobster in the Low Country!

05:00 PM - 09:00 PM

Tuesday January 20th

Steakhouse Night • Steakhouse Night is overflowing with delicious cuts of meat, including Rib-eye. Choose from any of our six sauces and sides to complete your entree. All available cuts of meat are blackened or grilled.

08:00 AM - 09:00 PM

Thursday January 22nd

Prime Rib Night • We serve up delicious prime rib in 2 serving sizes, 10 oz (queen) or 12 oz (king), served with roasting fingerling potatoes, seared green beans, Au jus, and horseradish cream sauce.

05:00 PM - 09:00 PM

Friday January 23rd

Live Music Night • Join us for live music featuring fun and lively local acts who know to bring entertainment and play all of your favorite songs. They even take requests! Come early for prime bar seating!

07:00 PM - 10:00 PM

[Page Title: The Refuge - Isle of Palms, Isle of Palms, SC]

× 
Lobster Night Every Sunday!

Join us for Lobster Night every Sunday evening from 5-9pm! Indulge in a one and a half pound steamed Maine lobster with two sides for only $47! Make your reservations today and be sure to let us know if you'd like to pre-reserve a certain amount of lobsters in the comments section!
Book your Sunday Night Lobster Dinner today! 
1517 Palm Blvd suite a, Isle of Palms, SC 29451
map marker pin Welcome To The Refuge 
Tucked away from the hustle and bustle of Charleston sits The Refuge in Isle of Palms. This family owned and operated venue is sure to please all. Enjoy your morning Macchiato with a fresh omelet or shrimp and grits from The Refuge's Morning Tide menu. Follow up with us in our dining room, where we also serve fresh, local food for lunch and dinner. A night at The Refuge wouldn't be complete without one of our signature cocktails concocted by our in-house mixologist. Planning a special event in Isle of Palms just got easier with our customized catering services available at The Refuge. Whether you're looking for a quick bite for lunch or a memorable evening of dining, let us be your refuge.
our menu Cater with us!

Reviews

Review by - Yelp

Steve S:

Excellent food and breakfast very friendly staff and great coffee We highly recommend the Refuge!

Review by - Yelp

Lisa L:

The menu changes but still keeps some of their classic choices. Always friendly staff and reasonable availability during busy season on IOP

Review by - Yelp

Lynne S:

Excellent food. I had their breakfast 2 eggs, hash browns, bacon & toast 2 days in a row it was so good and it arrived piping hot.

Review by - Yelp

Jim D:

Outstanding in every way. Had dinner and breakfast and was very pleased with the waitstaff, quality of food and atmosphere.

Review by - Yelp

Hailey N:

Amazing breakfast food! Wide range of menu options. The biscuits and gravy were fantastic!
